description: A delicious take on a toasty treat. Pear, blue cheese and walnut create a divine topping to level up your afternoon snack or beautiful brunch.
name: Pickled Pear, Blue Cheese & Walnut Crostini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pears, cored, cut into thin wedges
340g Woolworths stone baked sourdough baguette, cut diagonally into 1cm-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Stir sugar and 1/4 cup boiling water in a small bowl until sugar has dissolved. Add vinegar and stir to combine. Set aside for 15 minutes or until cooled completely. Add pear and turn to coat. Set aside for 15 minutes to pickle.
Heat a greased barbecue grill or chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Spray bread with oil. Cook, in 2 batches, for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and toasted.
Top bread slices with cheese, pickled pear and walnuts. Serve drizzled with honey.
